title: 08/23: Sleepers; Dominating Round 2; Cowboys OL (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Starting off the show with six sleepers (1:30) we haven't talked much about. Keep an eye on Chris Godwin and Austin Ekeler among others. We also talk about having a "Head Coach" roster spot on your Fantasy team (15:20) ... Ranking the rookie WRs (17:55) and determining when to draft them. Could Michael Gallup be the first off the board? Then we react to the big news about the Cowboys offensive line (22:58) and how it affects Zeke, Randall Cobb's role in GB (29:03) and if Kenyan Drake is really going to split carries with Frank Gore (30:36) ... Let's discuss late Round 2 of a Fantasy draft and which players we often take here (38:30). Do we prioritize Travis Kelce over Devonta Freeman, for example? Where do Jordan Howard and Mike Evans fit in? Also, if we could pick our ideal draft spot, what would it be (50:00)? ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
